item.title: Display Jupyter Notebooks with Academic
item.description: Learn how to blog in Academic using Jupyter notebooks

item.title: Academic: the website designer for Hugo
item.description: Create a beautifully simple website or blog in under 10 minutes.

I am now an Assistant Professor at National Laboratory of Pattern Recognition (NLPR), Institute of Automation, Chinese Academy of Sciences (CASIA), working with Prof. Weiming Hu’s team: Vision & Security Lab. Prior to that, I received a Ph.D in pattern recognition and intelligent system in 2020, under the supervision of Prof. Bin Fan and Prof. Chunhong Pan. I have wide research interests in Computer Vision and Remote Sensing, with a focus on 3D Point Cloud Processing, Image Segmentation, Video Understanding, Object Detection and Multi-Label Visual Recognition driven by Deep Learning.
